sentences.en: According to car attendant bade, down train ongoing direction runs forth.
sentences.cn: 按照列车员的吩咐, 顺着列车前进的方向往前跑.

sentences.en: All human needs are ongoing needs, that is, they are continuous.
sentences.cn: 人类的各种需要都是持续的需要, 即这些需要是持续不断的.

sentences.en: As a result , it will provide valuable references to the ongoing projects.
sentences.cn: 能给正在建设的单位提供参考.

sentences.en: Covance's ongoing success offers team members unsurpassed growth and career development opportunities.
sentences.cn: 科文斯的不断成功为团队成员提供了良好的成长和职业发展机会.

sentences.en: Goal 3 The prime contractor and the software subcontractor maintain ongoing communications.
sentences.cn: 目标3:主签约人和子签约人保持持续的沟通.

sentences.en: More likely than not, recognition is the most available and effective form of ongoing positive reinforcement.
sentences.cn: 很可能赏识是最可取的,是目前能起积极推动作用的有效形式.

sentences.en: Provides ongoing training to employees in selling techniques and customer service skills.
sentences.cn: 将新的销售策略和方法及时传达给员工.

sentences.en: Research is ongoing to determine the magnitude, if any, of this risk.
sentences.cn: 如果有任何增加, 都正在研究以明确风险大小.

sentences.en: The issues raised in the report relate directly to Age Concern's ongoing work in this area.
sentences.cn: 报告中提出的问题与“关心老人”组织在这方面正在做的工作有直接的关系.

sentences.en: their ongoing search for a new director
sentences.cn: 他们仍在寻找一个新主任

sentences.en: These bills are part of an ongoing murder investigation.
sentences.cn: 这些伪钞和我们正在调查的谋杀案有关.

sentences.en: They have a real fear that they'll be exterminated in the ongoing civil war.
sentences.cn: 他们十分害怕自己会在持续的内战中被彻底消灭。

sentences.en: This is an ongoing effort, and a worthy one.
sentences.cn: 这需要长期的努力, 但是非常的值得.

sentences.en: To support budget holders by providing ongoing training and advice.
sentences.cn: 向预算单位提供必要的培训并提供建议.

sentences.en: Training of your skills will be an ongoing necessity.
sentences.cn: 训练您的技能是游戏中所必须的.

words.tran_cn: 不间断的，进行的；前进的

trans.tran_cn: 不间断的，进行的，前进的
